1.name: Performance Monitor
1.description: Shows performance statistics in the corner of the screen.

2.name: In-Page Console
2.description: Adds a console to the page. Click the console icon in the bottom right corner to open it.
2.script: javascript:(function () { var script = document.createElement('script'); script.src='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/eruda'; document.body.append(script); script.onload = function () { eruda.init(); } })();
